articles.title: Lamont Marcell Jacobs wins Italy's first 100m athletics gold medal at Tokyo Olympics - ABC News
articles.description: The Italian creates history in Tokyo, claiming the gold medal in the men's final in a time of 9.80 seconds, while Australia's Rohan Browning looks to Paris after being eliminated in the semis.
articles.content:
Lamont Marcell Jacobs has delivered Italy its first gold medal in the men's 100 metres at the Tokyo Olympics.
